name: Post link shortcode
author: Micha≈Ç Ochman

sections.description:
Post link shortcode is a WordPress plugin that adds a possiblity to link to posts and pages within your post or page content using a custom shortcode.

For more information, check out Post link shortcode.

Features include:

  • Usage as simple as using [post] in your post/page content
  • Customising the output by specifying anchor title, text and custom CSS classes
sections.installation:
1. Install Post link shortcode either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the post-link-shortcode.php file to your server /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using your Post link shortcode! WordPress will automatically recognize [post] shortcode.
sections.faq:
How do I use it?

Use shortcode to add your post link. This plugin provides following shortcodes:

  • [post]
